item.description:
It's that time again Movie Buffs!! We will meet for brunch before our monthly movie at Joe's American Bar and Grill in Dedham and then take in a matinee across the street at the new Showcase Cinema de Lux at Legacy Place in Dedham. There are so many good movies showing right now, there will be several to choose from; I will post them the week before.

Joe's in Dedham is conveniently located on Route 1 (Providence Highway), directly off Route 128; it is exit 15A going north and exit 15B going south. Joe's is a local staple for fresh American cuisine in a comfortable atmosphere. Their brunch menu starts at $10.99. Our group will be offered a complimentary cocktail (Bloody Mary, Screwdriver, Mimosa, Champagne or Bud Light draft) when selecting an entree from the brunch menu and served with the meal.

After brunch we will head across the street to the new Showcase Cinema de Lux. We do not all have to see the same movie unless we want to. Feel free to branch out on your own if you so desire.

Please join us for the first Sunday Afternoon at the Movies of the new year! South Shore Baby Boomers...we would love to see you, too!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the bar with a Meetup sign

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sunday Afternoon at the Movies Plus Brunch
